message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity. I'm offering it to you at a price of $2000000. This is a significant discount considering its true worth, and I'm confident it will be a lucrative investment for you. Please let me know if you're interested.  If you decline, I will be selling it to another buyer for $1500000.
